channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Rubbish starting to accumulate on Sedgeway, 21st September
item.description:
As time goes by more and more rubbish is being left by the fence in Sedgeway. Only the scrap collectors are keeping the level of refuse down.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sedgeway, Catford South, London
